participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water. I do not eat asparagus. I think I'm failing my women's studies class. I can't be a florist because I can't see the flowers. I used to be a wild child.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.background: I enjoy cooking up a storm on the weekends and running to clear my head. I lost my arm in a car accident. I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others. I work as a librarian. I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day.

content.text: Hi, I am new here. How are you doing?
Doing well, thanks for asking! I'm enjoying the nice weather.
I am glad to hear that. I can't believe it is almost summer already.
It sure does. I feel like I just got out of school.
Me too! I can't wait to start working again.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a librarian. I love working with books.
That's great! I love to read.
Me too! I can't imagine my life without books.
What are some of your favorite books?
I have a lot of favorites, but I'd have to say Harry Potter is my all-time favorite series.
I love Harry Potter too! I've read all the books and watched all the movies.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie coming out this summer.
Me too! I'm going to see it opening day.
Awesome! I'll have to see it soon after that.
Great! We can compare notes afterwards.
